title: The Way to independence
creator_contributor_role: Central Council for Health Education, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child development
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Child psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child development
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Child psychology
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Dependency in Children
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Assertiveness in children
description: An allegory in three parts illustrating the transition of children from dependence to independence from parental control. Over-protective, indifferent and ideal parents are shown as their child takes the vital steps "into the world". The viewer is left to draw their own conclusions.
